error.message-404: Unfortunately, the page you were attempting to access doesn't exist now (or maybe it never existed). Here's what we suggest:

general.error-form: We could not process the form because of the following errors:
general.online-payments-processed-by-shopify: Online payments processed securely by Shopify

accounts.account-setup-text: If this is your first time logging in, please click on the Manage Addresses link in the sidebar to add your shipping address for your purchases today.  You can change this information or add additional addresses at any time.
accounts.account-status-text: Below you will see the status of any existing orders in our system.
accounts.account-begin-shopping-text: If you would like to begin shopping, please use the navigation drop downs to access all the great gift card ideas for services and accommodations at
accounts.account-cart-text: If you already have items in your cart, you may continue shopping or choose the check out option to proceed to order processing.
accounts.create-password-text: Create your password below to activate your account.
accounts.login-in-error-message: It looks like you dont have an account with the credentials you have provided. Please try again.  If you have forgotten your password,
accounts.you-havent-placed-any-orders-yet: You haven't placed any orders yet.
accounts.intro-text: You can add new addresses by clicking on the Add New Address button below, or manage existing addresses by clicking on the Manage Addresses on the sidebar.
accounts.password-reset-junk-email: If you don't receive a message in the next 5 minutes, please check your junk mail folder.
accounts.password-reset-text: Forgot your password? No problem.  Submit the email address associated with your account below.  We'll send you a message with a special link to reset your password.

forms.title: Title
forms.message-form-success-part1: Thank you for your interest in
forms.message-form-success-part2: Your correspondence has been successfully delivered and you should receive a response within one working day.
forms.name: Name

products.sold-out-details: Call us to place a pre-order. You will only be charged when this item arrives and your order has been fulfulled.

messages.message-has-free-shipping: Your order now qualifies for FREE shipping to anywhere in the continental USA and Canada.

newsletter.sign-up-form-success-message: Thank you for subscribing to our email newsletter.
newsletter.sign-up-form-error-message: There was an error subscribing to our email newsletter.
